bilingual.source: Helped by another off-duty police officer and a paramedic, the pair then helped passengers transfer to a freight train stopped alongside.
bilingual.target: 在另外一个休班警察和护理人员的帮助下，这两人帮助乘客转移到停在旁边的一辆运货列车上。

bilingual.source: " And last fall, in October, he made an apparent attempt to deflate the divorce rumors by sitting for a televised census count alongside his wife, who told the census taker, "I am his wife.
bilingual.target: 而在去年秋天，10月份，他做了一个明显的企图紧缩的普查数为电视坐在旁边他的妻子离婚的传闻，谁告诉人口普查接受者，“我是他的妻子。”

bilingual.source: What was happening was that two monkeys were dancing up and down alongside the shelf.
bilingual.target: 发生的事情是两只猴子在架子旁边上蹿下跳。

bilingual.source: The boat is docked alongside the pier.
The cat sat alongside the dog on the couch.
bilingual.target: 猫坐在沙发上狗的旁边。

bilingual.source: She walked alongside her friend in the park.
bilingual.target: 她在公园里和朋友并肩走着。

bilingual.source: The caddy walked alongside the golfer, offering tips.
bilingual.target: 球童走在高尔夫球手旁边，提供建议。

bilingual.source: The new employee works alongside the experienced staff.
bilingual.target: 新员工在有经验的员工旁边工作。

bilingual.source: The soldiers marched alongside each other in perfect unison.
Cave paintings often depict the aurochs alongside other wild animals.
bilingual.target: 洞穴壁画经常描绘原牛和其他野生动物在一起。

list.abstract: 英 [əlɒŋ'saɪd] 美 [ə'lɔŋ'saɪd] alongside date 装货日 ; 船舶靠泊日期 ; 船舶靠岸接受装货日期 ; 货物装船日 alongside of 与 ; 在旁边 ; 并肩 come alongside 傍靠 ; 靠过来 They campaigned alongside the friendly forces. 他们与友军并肩作战。

yingyinNormal.en: My father works alongside our leader, Marcus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的父亲跟随我们的领袖马库斯工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Rajesh, I've had the privilege of working alongside you for many years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拉杰，我有幸跟你一起共事了多年。

yingyinNormal.en: But also stands alongside such other nonsensical queries as "Who let the dogs out?" And, "How are they hanging?"
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有其他一些愚蠢的问题，比如"谁把狗放出来了？"还有"他们过得如何"？

yingyinNormal.en: Eventually the success of the mission and the well-being of the people alongside me became more important than my own success.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比我自己的成功更重要，和我身边人的福祉比我自己的成功更重要。

yingyinNormal.en: Recently, we have learned that he has sent troops to fight alongside the Syrian regime, assisting them in the destruction of the Syrian nation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近我们又了解到他已派出军队与叙利亚当局并肩作战，协助他们毁灭叙利亚国家。

yingyinNormal.en: My last review condemned it to the tourist trade. I said, "Gusteau has finally found his rightful place in history right alongside another equally famous chef, Monsieur Boyardee."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我上一次的评鉴是在旅游手册上，我说道“食神终于找他的历史地位等同另一位餐包师傅莫榭尔．包亚迪”。

yingyinNormal.en: Because sometime in the not so distant future, you're gonna be pulling up to a red light in your beat up old Pinto, and that person's gonna be pulling up right alongside you in their brand new Porsche with their beautiful wife by their side, who's got big voluptuous tits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为也许就在不远的将来，当你开着你的福特破平托在路口等红灯时，你发现在你旁边停下的是一辆崭新保时捷而车主就是现在你身边的人 他娇妻在侧双峰撩人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The proposal is that it should sit <highlight>alongside</highlight> the existing city of culture title.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该提议是，它应该与现有的文化名城并排。

examination_example.sentence: While polls show Britons rate "the countryside" <highlight>alongside</highlight> the royal family, Shakespeare and the NHS as what makes them proudest of their country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管民调显示，英国人将“乡村”与王室、莎士比亚和国民医疗服务体系(NHS)并列为他们最自豪的国家，但这一点的政治支持有限。

examination_example.sentence: History from below stood <highlight>alongside</highlight> biographies of great men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从下往上看的历史与伟人传记并列。

examination_example.sentence: Doubtless a piece of boiled beef can always be served up on Sunday <highlight>alongside</highlight> some steamed vegetables.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，在星期天，一块煮牛肉总能和一些蒸蔬菜一起上桌。

examination_example.sentence: We need progressive policies that shape collective action, <highlight>alongside</highlight> engaged citizens pushing for change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要形成集体行动的进步政策，以及推动变革的积极公民。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Alongside</highlight> that, many countries are introducing English into the primary-school curriculum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，许多国家正在将英语引入小学课程。

examination_example.sentence: Vocational schools should do a better job of fostering problem-solving skills and helping students work <highlight>alongside</highlight> robots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 职业培训学校可以在以下方面做得更好，培养学生解决问题的能力，培训学生和机器一起工作的能力。

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The Dutch king has revealed that for more than two decades, he has held down a part-time second job <highlight>alongside</highlight> his royal duties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 荷兰国王透露，20多年来，在履行王室职责的同时，他还有一份兼职工作。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The China Through A Looking Glass exhibition in New York exhibited 140 pieces of China-inspired fashionable clothing <highlight>alongside</highlight> Chinese works of art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在纽约举办的展览，“镜中的中国”，展出了140件中国风格的时尚服装和中国艺术品。

examination_example.sentence: During the long trip home, following a weekend of hunting, Ehlers thought about the small dog he had seen trembling <highlight>alongside</highlight> the road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个周末的狩猎结束后，在回家的漫漫旅途中，Ehlers想起了他看到的那条在路边颤抖的小狗。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Dale even made other members of the family take part, using Rick's younger brother to play Batman <highlight>alongside</highlight> his Robin.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 戴尔甚至让其他家庭成员也参与进来，让瑞克的弟弟和他的罗宾一起扮演蝙蝠侠。

examination_example.sentence: Villagers have joined in Sadiman’s efforts and worked <highlight>alongside</highlight> him to plant the trees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 村民们加入了Sadiman的努力，和他一起植树。

examination_example.sentence: By mid-morning, four kids were sculpting (雕塑) the sand <highlight>alongside</highlight> him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上午10点左右，四个孩子在他旁边雕刻沙子。

examination_example.sentence: The signals were put <highlight>alongside</highlight> railway tracks (轨道).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信号灯被放置在铁轨旁。

表示状态转变的前缀, 一般与adj连用, 构成表语形容词。
表示处于某种状态 "…的"。
